question: Pharmacokinetics is:

options.a: The study of biological and therapeutic effects of drugs

options.b: The study of absorption, distribution, metabolism and excretion of drugs

options.c: The study of mechanisms of drug action

options.d: The study of methods of new drug development

description: A name my father gave me

question: What does “pharmacokinetics” include?

options.c: Influence of drugs on metabolism processes
